text:
A trillionaire, I'm a young crypto trillionaire
Zeros longer than Warren Buffets shares
all my GPU’s compared to your one pair just isn’t fair
I’m a binary disease, bleeding zeroes ones threes

All these miners wanna rage like their underage and blind
So I don’t mine shit cuz I don’t got a mind
My only proof of work goes to the almighty ledger
And the almighty transfer to the U U S D dollar

Kraken, Coinbase, Binance, Gemini all get it poppin’
Got Satoshi on a bridge crump dancing and pop lockin’
tell regulators ha-ha-ha-ha
you can't track him, you can't stop him

I play by them dumb rules, hablo Spanish then I vanish
I can't spend it until later
Mixed like meat with my potaters
You haters couldn't trace it with Adobe illustrator

A trillion here, a trillion there
Cyberpunk chick with blue hair
Binary thinking I’m the one cuz I got zeroes I could spare
I do business on the Ledger, hoping killer whales see me
as the laser eyed free Willy

Your laser beams are weak you're like cyclops as a toddler
OK you're a whale but what's a whale to a hodler

Paris Hilton thought it’s hot, enough to drop some dollars
Asking for advice like someone tell me what's the answer

Aboard my yacht a bored ape talked shit about harambe
I beat his moneymaker to a billionaire zombie

Don't you love an NFT, NFTs be temptin me
I bought so much from open sea, it changed its name to empty sea

Forreal my wallet almost crashed it,
Even If I wanted dollars no atm could cash this
Only USBs beneath my mattress,
Like a browser with no data, bitch I’m cacheless

Buko crypto makem trolls talk sick,
My sole response to when they talk’s, ick
I handle conversations that are so truly toxic,
Time is still money, so I keep em all tiktoksic

See…they say I hoddle like the Winklevoss twins or Michael Saylor
imagine whales were, in a tub, In the thousand x club…

metadata.note: setup bars; not a tight rhyme pair

text:
rubba dub dub, and can Rito Rhymes join?
My name aint Bit but I keep that Coin, boy

Red pill, blue pill, you will, drool, chew before you swallow
Buterin or Hoskinson, who you gonna follow?

I don’t owe you like ou I know the answer
For a trillie let’s kill covid with cancer

My wallet shakes the ledger, aint no luxury for stealth
Trusting is for dummies and for backstabbing elfs
Trust me, smart contracts or else,
On some Hari Kari how it executes itself

Jack Dorsey to the rescue during distress.
Thinkin out the box he made a square into success
then turned the square into a block he made it 6x,
with two chains dude’s brain turns crypto into cube chains.

Motherfuckin, bears look at me but they poutin
inspite of all they doubtin, them chickens gettin floundered,
I do what I do while bulls look at me astounded,
the way I rock the boat I turn a ocean to a mountain
And that’s that
The whole market’s getting hacked,
I’ll just let the bottom crash like a heiny getting slapped cuz I’m the IBM of rap.
No cap. Code cracked. Rito’s Rhymes are key… cryptically . no math.
